titles.title: Highway Trust Fund Reform Act of 2019

bill.summary:
Highway Trust Fund Reform Act of 2019
This bill eliminates the requirement that all laborers and mechanics working on federal-aid highway and public transportation projects shall be paid wages at rates not less than the locally prevailing wage rate.
